id.description: The unique identifier for the order status.

name.description: The name or description of the order status.

is_open.description: Indicates if the order is open for processing.

is_declined.description: Indicates if the order has been declined.

is_cancelled.description: Indicates if the order has been cancelled.

is_shipped.description: Indicates if the order has been shipped.

color.description: The color associated with the order status.

email_template_id.description: The ID of the email template associated with the order status.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the order status was last updated.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the order status was created.

is_fully_refunded.description: Indicates if the order has been fully refunded.

is_partially_refunded.description: Indicates if the order has been partially refunded.

is_quote_status.description: Indicates if the order has a quote status.

is_partially_shipped.description: Indicates if the order has been partially shipped.
